f2cea539; 0; ; 1; (Alice, 1000)
Alice Signature: 
4787df35; 1; (f2cea539, 0); 3; (Bob, 150)(Alice, 845)(Gopesh, 5)
Alice Signature: 
40671f57; 1; (4787df35, 0); 3; (Gopesh, 100)(Bob, 45)(Bob, 5)
Bob Signature: 
84dfb9b3; 1; (40671f57, 0); 2; (Bob, 100)(Gopesh, 5)
Gopesh Signature: 

// Invalid transaction as the output sum is greater than input sum
84dfb9b3; 2; (40671f57, 0)(40671f57, 2); 2; (Bob, 100)(Gopesh, 5)
Gopesh Signature: 
// Invalid since the input UTXOs belong to two different persons. Bob and Gopesh in this case
84dfb9b3; 2; (40671f57, 1)(40671f57, 2); 1; (Gopesh, 50)
Bob Signature: 
F6847ad8; 1; (40671f57, 1); 3; (Alice, 5)(Bob, 35)(Bob, 5)
Bob Signature: 
// Invalid transaction because the input UTXO has already been spent
